title: Fs/t wagner bat right uzit sgc a
author: broadhurstinc

posts.post_title: Fs/t wagner bat right uzit sgc a
posts.post_content:
Anyone one interested in doing a low grade back run i have this uzit i picked up on the bay for $501.00 not too long ago. just isn't doin it for me cuz of the trim job but it's clean and would still fill a spot. 

I'm looking to retire off this beauty so the price is $525.00 dlvd 

or would trade for something i could use for my set: [url]http://www.sgccardregistry.com/set.aspx?cat=1&set=239&userset=4491[/url]

paypal gift preferred or check / mo

email takes priority to pm's

Thanks, Kris
Nice UZIT, Kris...If I had the flow to buy it, I would.  Good luck on the sale!
